newsitem.title: USA: Edison Source seeks suppliers of renewable power.
newsitem.headline: Edison Source seeks suppliers of renewable power.

text.p: Edison Source, the unregulated power marketing unit of Edison International, has issued a "request for proposals" for supppliers of renewable power.
The company said Wednesday it plans to introduce a "green power" offering to California residential and small commercial customers in January.
"We believe there is significant consumer interest in alternative energy sources in California," said Steve Pazian, president of Edison's retail services unit.
Edison is asking for pricing and capacity information for power generated from solar, wind, geothermal, small hydroelectric, biomass, and landfill gas sources.
The company is accepting notices to bid through July 23 and final proposals are due by August 8.
